analyzed: @166a * // bdag la rigs pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum la sogs pa dang mi 'gal ba yin no //
translated: The term reasonable means not in conflict with perception and so on.

original: khyod la mi rigs so zhes bya ba mngon sum la sogs pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: khyod la mi rigs so zhes bya ba mngon sum la sogs pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: The term unreasonable means in conflict with perception and so on.

original: phan pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni snga phyi mi 'gal ba dang 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: phan pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni snga phyi mi 'gal ba dang 'brel pa yin no //
translated: The term beneficial means not in conflict with what precedes or follows, and is related to that.

original: de las bzlog pa'i phyir phan pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa'i phyir phan pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The term unbeneficial is the opposite of that.

original: shin tu myur ba zhes bya ba ni shin tu grags pa'o //🔽mchog tu smra ba zhes bya ba ni don gyi de kho na rjod par byed pa'am /
analyzed: shin tu myur ba zhes bya ba ni shin tu grags pa'o // mchog tu smra ba zhes bya ba ni don gyi de kho na rjod par byed pa'am /
translated: The term very quick means very well known.

original: shin tu myur du smra ba'i sgo nas don gsal ba nyid kyi phyir mchog tu smra ba'o //
analyzed: shin tu myur du smra ba'i sgo nas don gsal ba nyid kyi phyir mchog tu smra ba'o //
translated: The term excellent speaker means one who expresses the reality of the meaning, or who is an excellent speaker because of the clarity of the meaning through speaking very quickly.

original: rtsod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i rgyu mtshan yin la /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i rgyu mtshan yin la /
translated: The term for the sake of debate means the reason for debate.

original: bskyed pa ni rab tu 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: bskyed pa ni rab tu 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The term arisen means engaged.

original: rtsod pa las rnam par thar pa'i phyir ni rtsod pa yongs su spong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsod pa las rnam par thar pa'i phyir ni rtsod pa yongs su spong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The term for the sake of freedom from debate means for the sake of abandoning debate.

original: rtsod pa zhi bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rtsod pa zhi bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should pacify disputes.

original: rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba ni rtsod pa'i len sbyin pa'i sgo nas rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba ni rtsod pa'i len sbyin pa'i sgo nas rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: Pacification of disputes is the pacification of disputes by means of the gift of a dispute.

original: tshar gcad par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni pham par bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshar gcad par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni pham par bya ba'o //
translated: One should defeat means: one should be victorious.

original: pho nyar 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: pho nyar 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: One should go as a messenger, etc.

original: 'di las dang po blangs nas de la skyel bar byed pa dang / de las blangs nas 'dir len par byed pa'i don du gnyer ba'i mngag gzhug gang yin pa de ni 'dir pho nya yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di las dang po blangs nas de la skyel bar byed pa dang / de las blangs nas 'dir len par byed pa'i don du gnyer ba'i mngag gzhug gang yin pa de ni 'dir pho nya yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: One who is employed as a messenger here, who takes from this and delivers to that, and who takes from that and delivers here, is known here as a messenger.

original: gang dag mi 'dod du zin kyang mngags pa de ni mngag gzhug pa yin no //
analyzed: gang dag mi 'dod du zin kyang mngags pa de ni mngag gzhug pa yin no //
translated: One who is sent even though not desired is a servant.

original: pho nyar 'gro ba de nyid kyi rgyu mtshan gyis 'tsho bar byed pa ni log pa'i yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir log pa'i 'tsho ba yin te /
analyzed: pho nyar 'gro ba de nyid kyi rgyu mtshan gyis 'tsho bar byed pa ni log pa'i yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir log pa'i 'tsho ba yin te /
translated: One who makes a living by the very reason of going as a messenger is a wrong livelihood, because of wrong enjoyment of objects.

original: des 'tsho bar byed cing sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: des 'tsho bar byed cing sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: By that, one makes a living and accomplishes.

original: de gang gi pho nyar 'gro ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang gi pho nyar 'gro ba yin zhe na /
translated: What kind of messenger is he?

original: rgyal po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rgyal po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The verse text says, “kings, etc.”

original: rgyal po ni dbang bskur ba thob pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyal po ni dbang bskur ba thob pa yin te /
translated: Kings are those who have received the consecration.

original: rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba ni blon po yin no //🔽grong 'dab kyi mi ni grong 'dab kyi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba ni blon po yin no // grong 'dab kyi mi ni grong 'dab kyi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
translated: Ministers are those who have been consecrated as regents.🔽People of the town are those who are the leaders of the town.

original: ljongs kyi mi ni ljongs kyi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ljongs kyi mi ni ljongs kyi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
translated: People of the country are those who are the leaders of the country.

original: nor can ni mkhar gyi dbang phyug ngag yin no //🔽tshong dpon ni tshong bdag gi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: nor can ni mkhar gyi dbang phyug ngag yin no // tshong dpon ni tshong bdag gi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
translated: The wealthy are those who are the lords of the castle.🔽Merchants are those who are the leaders of the merchants.

original: ded dpon ni gang dag 'dren par byed pa'i sgo nas don mthun dag 'don par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ded dpon ni gang dag 'dren par byed pa'i sgo nas don mthun dag 'don par byed pa'o //
translated: Caravan leaders are those who lead caravans.

original: tshul 'chos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: tshul 'chos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The verse text says, “hypocrites, etc.”

original: tshul 'chos pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: tshul 'chos pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Hypocrisy is of three kinds:

original: rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pas pha rol la yon tan srid pa'i bsam pas gzhan la spyod lam ston par byed pa dang / dben @166b par byed pa'i phyogs su gnas pa dang / san ni kha yang dag par ston pa'o //🔽kha gsag ni rnam pa gsum ste /🔽rnyed ba dang bkur sti'i bsam pa can gyis snyan par smra ba dang / bdag gi yon tan brjod pa dang / chos smra ba'o //🔽gzhogs slong ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pas pha rol la yon tan srid pa'i bsam pas gzhan la spyod lam ston par byed pa dang / dben @166b par byed pa'i phyogs su gnas pa dang / san ni kha yang dag par ston pa'o // kha gsag ni rnam pa gsum ste / rnyed ba dang bkur sti'i bsam pa can gyis snyan par smra ba dang / bdag gi yon tan brjod pa dang / chos smra ba'o // gzhogs slong ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: One shows off one's behavior to others with the thought I am living in solitude, I am living in a remote place, and I am living in a secluded place.🔽🔽Flattery is of three kinds:🔽one speaks pleasantly, one praises one's own good qualities, and one preaches the Dharma with the thought of gain and honor.🔽🔽Hinting is of three kinds:🔽

original: rnyed pa'i bsam pas lus kyi gnod pa'i gzhi yang dag par ston pa dang / mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po tshig gis mngags pa dang / phyi rol gyi rgyu mtshan lung ston pa'o //🔽rnyed pa'i bsam pa can gyis ser sna can la sogs pa la gtong ba la rgya cher bsngags pa byed pa ni thob kyis 'jal ba yin no //
analyzed: rnyed pa'i bsam pas lus kyi gnod pa'i gzhi yang dag par ston pa dang / mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po tshig gis mngags pa dang / phyi rol gyi rgyu mtshan lung ston pa'o //🔽rnyed pa'i bsam pa can gyis ser sna can la sogs pa la gtong ba la rgya cher bsngags pa byed pa ni thob kyis 'jal ba yin no //
translated: One shows one's behavior to others with the thought I am a spiritual teacher, with the thought I am a preceptor, with the thought I am a master, with the thought I am a monk, with the thought I am an elder, with the thought I am a novice, with the thought I am a monk who is a master of the collections of discourses, with the thought I am a master of the collections of discipline, with the thought I am a master of the collections of clear science, with the thought I am a master of the discourses, with the thought I am a master of the discipline, with the thought I am a master of the clear science, with the thought I am a master of the Vinaya, with the thought I am a master of the commentaries, with the thought I am a master of the summary works, with the thought I am a master of the manuals, with the thought I am a master of the treatises, with the thought I am a master of the discourses, with the thought I am a master of the discipline, with the thought I am a master of the clear science, with the thought I am a master of the Vinaya, with the thought I am a master of the commentaries, with the thought I am a master of the summary works, with the thought I am a master of the manuals, with the thought I am a master of the treatises, with the thought I am a master of the discourses, with the thought I am a master of the discipline, with the thought I am a master of the clear science, with the thought I am a master of the Vinaya, with the thought I am a master of the commentaries, with the thought I am a master of the summary works, with the thought I am a master of the manuals, with the thought I am a master of the treatises, with the thought I am a master of the discourses, with the thought I am a master of the discipline, with the thought I am a master of the clear science, with the thought I am a master of the Vinaya, with the thought I am a master of the commentaries, with the thought

original: gzhan las rnyed pa'i rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnyed pa gzhan gyi don du sbyin par byed pa 'am /
analyzed: gzhan las rnyed pa'i rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnyed pa gzhan gyi don du sbyin par byed pa 'am /
translated: He gives away the gain he has obtained from others for the sake of other gains.

original: zang zing la sogs pa rnyed pa'i don du stobs par byed cing /
analyzed: zang zing la sogs pa rnyed pa'i don du stobs par byed cing /
translated: Or, he gives in order to obtain material goods, etc.

original: ji ltar na rnyed pa rnyed par 'gyur zhes rnyed pas rnyed pa bsgrub par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar na rnyed pa rnyed par 'gyur zhes rnyed pas rnyed pa bsgrub par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: He desires to obtain gain by means of gain.🔽Bad knowledge, etc. The results of this life, the various mundane arts, are not the means of attaining the results of heaven and liberation, and so are not the most important.

original: rig pa ngan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la skye ba 'di'i 'bras bu 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i bye brag ni mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu sgrub par byed pa ma yin pas gtso bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las phyi rol du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir rig pa ngan pa yin no //
analyzed: rig pa ngan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la skye ba 'di'i 'bras bu 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i bye brag ni mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu sgrub par byed pa ma yin pas gtso bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las phyi rol du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir rig pa ngan pa yin no //
translated: And because they are outside the teachings of the Tathagata, they are bad knowledge.

original: log pa'i 'tsho ba de nyid log pa'i las la brten pa'i sgo nas 'tsho bar byed pas na log pas 'tsho ba yin no //
analyzed: log pa'i 'tsho ba de nyid log pa'i las la brten pa'i sgo nas 'tsho bar byed pas na log pas 'tsho ba yin no //
translated: He lives by that bad livelihood, because he lives by depending on bad actions.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: ltas ngan dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ltas ngan dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The words bad omens and so on are stated.

original: 'phral dus gas pa las gang byung zhing skye ba ni ltas ngan yin te /
analyzed: 'phral dus gas pa las gang byung zhing skye ba ni ltas ngan yin te /
translated: Whatever arises and is born from a sudden break is a bad omen.

original: ltas ngan de'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de lung ston par byed cing lung bstan pa des nor gyi tshogs gang rnyed pa des 'tsho bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: ltas ngan de'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de lung ston par byed cing lung bstan pa des nor gyi tshogs gang rnyed pa des 'tsho bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Whatever is the result of that bad omen, that is predicted. By that prediction, whatever wealth is obtained, one makes a living from that.

original: rma zhes bya ba ni rma cung zhig skyes pa ni don sgrub par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: rma zhes bya ba ni rma cung zhig skyes pa ni don sgrub par byed pa yin la /
translated: As for wounds, a small wound that arises is a means of accomplishing a purpose.

original: kha cig ni don ma yin pa skyed par byed pa yin no zhes rma'i mtshan nyid lung bstan pa la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: kha cig ni don ma yin pa skyed par byed pa yin no zhes rma'i mtshan nyid lung bstan pa la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
translated: Some say that it produces a non-purpose. Thus, one becomes skilled in predicting the characteristics of wounds.

original: rmi lam gyi mtshan nyid dang / mes tshig pa dang / chus reg pa las 'phral du gos sam lus la chu'i thigs pa lhung ba ni chus reg pa zhes bya ba dang / byi bas zos pa'i 'bras bu lung ston pa la mkhas pa des kyang 'tsho bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rmi lam gyi mtshan nyid dang / mes tshig pa dang / chus reg pa las 'phral du gos sam lus la chu'i thigs pa lhung ba ni chus reg pa zhes bya ba dang / byi bas zos pa'i 'bras bu lung ston pa la mkhas pa des kyang 'tsho bar byed pa yin no //
translated: One makes a living by being skilled in predicting dreams, being burned by fire, being touched by water, and the sudden falling of water drops on clothes or the body, called being touched by water, and the fruit eaten by mice.

original: gdon babs ni zhugs pa'o //🔽dbyangs rtogs pa zhes bya ba la /🔽dbyangs so so tha dad @167a * //
analyzed: gdon babs ni zhugs pa'o // dbyangs rtogs pa zhes bya ba la / dbyangs so so tha dad @167a * //
translated: The possession of a demon is the entry of a demon.

original: pa'i 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu lung bstan pa la mkhas pa'o //🔽'byung po thams cad kyi skad ces bya ba la /
analyzed: pa'i 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu lung bstan pa la mkhas pa'o // 'byung po thams cad kyi skad ces bya ba la /
translated: The knowledge of song is the skill in the prediction of the results of the various different melodies of song.

original: 'byung po thams cad kyi skad yongs su shes pa'i nus pa rnyed par byed pa'i bstan bcos yod la /
analyzed: 'byung po thams cad kyi skad yongs su shes pa'i nus pa rnyed par byed pa'i bstan bcos yod la /
translated: The language of all creatures is the treatise which causes the acquisition of the ability to understand the language of all creatures.

original: bstan bcos de la mngon par goms pa la bya'i skad kyi don rnam par 'brel pa la yang mkhas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos de la mngon par goms pa la bya'i skad kyi don rnam par 'brel pa la yang mkhas par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the one who is skilled in the treatise becomes skilled in the connection of the meaning of the language of birds.

original: yan lag rig pa ni gang gis lus kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag rig pa ni gang gis lus kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of limbs is that by which one knows the characteristics of the body.

original: gos rig pa ni gang gis yon tan dang ldan pa dang yon tan yod pa ma yin no zhes gos kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'o //
analyzed: gos rig pa ni gang gis yon tan dang ldan pa dang yon tan yod pa ma yin no zhes gos kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of cloth is that by which one knows the characteristics of cloth, such as this cloth has good qualities or this cloth has no good qualities.

original: ne tso rig pa ni gang gis ne tso'i mtshan nyid shes pa'o ;
analyzed: ne tso rig pa ni gang gis ne tso'i mtshan nyid shes pa'o ;
translated: The knowledge of parrots is that by which one knows the characteristics of parrots.

original: / dgos pa'i don du 'gro ba la bsngags pa'i mtshan nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i shis pa de'i mtshan nyid gang gis shes pa de ni shes pa'i rig pa'am //
analyzed: / dgos pa'i don du 'gro ba la bsngags pa'i mtshan nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i shis pa de'i mtshan nyid gang gis shes pa de ni shes pa'i rig pa'am //
translated: The science of knowledge is that by which one knows the auspicious characteristics of the time when one should set out on a journey, and the characteristics of the time when one should not set out on a journey.

original: ne tso ma gtogs pa bya gzhan gyi mtshan nyid la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ne tso ma gtogs pa bya gzhan gyi mtshan nyid la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
translated: The science of birds is the knowledge of the characteristics of birds other than parrots.

original: mthe bo'i rig pa ni gang gis mthe bo la 'jug pa la sogs pa byed pa yin no //🔽yud tsam dag la rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽dus 'di ni bzang la /
analyzed: mthe bo'i rig pa ni gang gis mthe bo la 'jug pa la sogs pa byed pa yin no // yud tsam dag la rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / dus 'di ni bzang la /
translated: The science of fingers is that by which one knows how to read the fingers, etc.

original: 'di ni bzang po ma yin pas yud tsam 'di la las 'di bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //🔽skar ma dag shar ba ni skar ma bzang po byung ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni bzang po ma yin pas yud tsam 'di la las 'di bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o // skar ma dag shar ba ni skar ma bzang po byung ba yin te /
translated: The science of moments is that by which one knows the right time for an action, such as: This is the right time for this action, and that is not the right time for it.🔽The science of stars is that by which one knows the rising of the stars, the good and bad stars, and the stars that are favorable for the undertaking of an action.

original: don de ni rgyu skar 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la mkhas pa dang / bya ba rtsom pa'i rgyu skar gyi ming la mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
analyzed: don de ni rgyu skar 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la mkhas pa dang / bya ba rtsom pa'i rgyu skar gyi ming la mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
translated: The science of the movements of the stars is that by which one knows the movements of the stars.

original: ro brtag pa la zhes bya ba ni mi shi ba'i lus ma snad pa ni ro'i sgras brjod de /
analyzed: ro brtag pa la zhes bya ba ni mi shi ba'i lus ma snad pa ni ro'i sgras brjod de /
translated: A corpse is the body of a dead person that is not mutilated.

original: de'i brtag pa ni ro langs la sogs pa'i las de la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de'i brtag pa ni ro langs la sogs pa'i las de la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
translated: The rite of the corpse is the rite of the vetala, etc.

original: 'tshe ba la sogs pa zhi ba'i don gyi las ni zhi ba'i las yin te /
analyzed: 'tshe ba la sogs pa zhi ba'i don gyi las ni zhi ba'i las yin te /
translated: The rite of pacification is the rite for the pacification of harm, etc.

original: rig byed las bstan pa'am gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: rig byed las bstan pa'am gzhan pa'o //
translated: It is taught in the Vedas or elsewhere.

original: rgyas pa'i las ni spel ba dang 'byor pa rgyas par byed pa'i las shes bya'i bar du'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa'i las ni spel ba dang 'byor pa rgyas par byed pa'i las shes bya'i bar du'o //
translated: The rite of prosperity is the rite for the increase of wealth and prosperity.

original: drag po'i las ni gzhan gyi srog la gnod par byed pa mgar ba la sogs pa'i las sam /
analyzed: drag po'i las ni gzhan gyi srog la gnod par byed pa mgar ba la sogs pa'i las sam /
translated: The rite of violence is the rite of a blacksmith, etc.

original: bcud kyis len gyi las yin no //
analyzed: bcud kyis len gyi las yin no //
translated: It is the rite of alchemy.

original: 'ga' zhig gis nad zhi bar byed pa'i phyir sngags bzlas pa'i chus brlan pa'i gtor ma'i las yin no //🔽yi ge'i rig pa ni yi ge'i grangs dang / rtsis dang / skar ma'i bstan bcos rig pa'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis nad zhi bar byed pa'i phyir sngags bzlas pa'i chus brlan pa'i gtor ma'i las yin no // yi ge'i rig pa ni yi ge'i grangs dang / rtsis dang / skar ma'i bstan bcos rig pa'o //
translated: Some say that it is the rite of the oblation moistened with water enchanted by a spell for the pacification of disease.

original: dgod pa ni yan lag rnam par dgod pa'o //
analyzed: dgod pa ni yan lag rnam par dgod pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of letters is the knowledge of the number of letters, of calculation, and of the science of the stars.🔽The knowledge of the arrangement of parts is the knowledge of the arrangement of the limbs.

original: bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / nyi shu pa @167b dag ci tsam du 'gyur zhes dris pa la myur du yongs su shes pa ni grangs la mkhas pa yin no //
analyzed: bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / nyi shu pa @167b dag ci tsam du 'gyur zhes dris pa la myur du yongs su shes pa ni grangs la mkhas pa yin no //
translated: The fourth, the fifth, and the twentieth.  How many are there? Quickly, he replies. This is skill in numbers.

original: lag pas phyag rgya'i rnam pa bcing ba'am /
analyzed: lag pas phyag rgya'i rnam pa bcing ba'am /
translated: The binding of the mudra with the hand is hand mudra.

original: lag rtsis kyi brda ni lag brda yin no //
analyzed: lag rtsis kyi brda ni lag brda yin no //
translated: The sign of the hand calculation is hand sign.

original: lam rig pa ni gang gis lam du 'jug pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o //
analyzed: lam rig pa ni gang gis lam du 'jug pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o //
translated: The path knowledge is the knowledge of the result of engaging in the path.

original: nad zhi ba'i thabs su gyur pa'i man ngag ni gso ba yin no //
analyzed: nad zhi ba'i thabs su gyur pa'i man ngag ni gso ba yin no //
translated: The instruction that becomes the means of pacifying illness is healing.

original: bud med dag gi thun mong ma yin pa'i nad nye bar zhi ba'i thabs ston pa ni bud med kyi gso ba yin la /
analyzed: bud med dag gi thun mong ma yin pa'i nad nye bar zhi ba'i thabs ston pa ni bud med kyi gso ba yin la /
translated: The teaching of the means of pacifying the uncommon illnesses of women is women's healing,

original: de bzhin du skyes pa'i gso ba dang / gzhon nu'i gso ba dang / gzhon nu ma'i gos bdag kyang yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du skyes pa'i gso ba dang / gzhon nu'i gso ba dang / gzhon nu ma'i gos bdag kyang yin no //
translated: and likewise, men's healing, youth's healing, and young women's healing.

original: sman dag gi sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni smin pa la sogs pa'i rdzas byin pas 'tsho bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sman dag gi sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni smin pa la sogs pa'i rdzas byin pas 'tsho bar byed pa'o //
translated: The so-called application of medicines is the means of sustaining life by giving substances such as ripened [fruits].

original: nor bu'i mtshan nyid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nor bu'i mtshan nyid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The characteristics of jewels and so on are as follows.🔽

original: gang du nor bu dug la sogs pa sel bar byed pa'i nus pa du ma dang ldan pa de dag gi mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas shes pa yin no //

translated: One knows the characteristics of jewels, etc., by means of their classification, since they have many powers, such as the power to remove poison, etc.

original: dbyig pa la bzang po dang bzang po ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa nyid kyi phyir dbyig pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dbyig pa la bzang po dang bzang po ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa nyid kyi phyir dbyig pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
translated: One becomes skilled in the characteristics of a staff, since a staff has the characteristics of good and bad.

original: ral gri ni ral gri yin te /
analyzed: ral gri ni ral gri yin te /
translated: A sword is a sword,

original: ral gri la sogs pa'i mtshon dag gi bzang po dang bzang po ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ral gri la sogs pa'i mtshon dag gi bzang po dang bzang po ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
translated: One becomes skilled in the characteristics of good and bad swords, etc., since swords, etc., have the characteristics of good and bad.

original: glang po che la sogs pa nas gzhon nu ma'i mthar thug pa dag gis mdzes pa dang mdzes pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa'i mtshan nyid gang dang ldan pa dag khyim du gzhag pa las dge ba dang / mi dge bar 'gyur ba de'i mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: glang po che la sogs pa nas gzhon nu ma'i mthar thug pa dag gis mdzes pa dang mdzes pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa'i mtshan nyid gang dang ldan pa dag khyim du gzhag pa las dge ba dang / mi dge bar 'gyur ba de'i mtshan nyid dang /
translated: One becomes skilled in the characteristics of elephants, etc., up to young women, since they have the characteristics of good and bad, and one should place in one's home those that are good and avoid those that are bad.🔽 🔽One becomes skilled in the characteristics of the good and bad qualities of the body, since the body has the characteristics of good and bad qualities.

original: mtshan nyid 'di dang ldan na tshe thung zhing 'dis tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dis longs spyod chung zhing 'dis longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams chung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di yin zhing bsod nams che ba 'di yin pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan nyid 'di dang ldan na tshe thung zhing 'dis tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dis longs spyod chung zhing 'dis longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams chung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di yin zhing bsod nams che ba 'di yin pa dang /
translated: If one has these characteristics, one will have a short life, and if one has these, one will have a long life. If one has these characteristics, one will have little wealth, and if one has these, one will have great wealth.🔽These are the characteristics of having little merit, and these are the characteristics of having great merit.🔽These are the characteristics of having a small body, and these are the characteristics of having a large body.

original: 'di lus chung la lus bong che ba dang / 'di rje bo'i mtshan nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'di lus chung la lus bong che ba dang / 'di rje bo'i mtshan nyid yin la /

original: 'di bran gyi mtshan nyid yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di bran gyi mtshan nyid yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa yin no //

original: mgyogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ru ha dang / mas gtong ba dang / yan lag ma lus pa dugs byas pa ni mgyogs pa'i sgras bstan to //
analyzed: mgyogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ru ha dang / mas gtong ba dang / yan lag ma lus pa dugs byas pa ni mgyogs pa'i sgras bstan to //

original: skyug pa dang / 'khru ba ni rab tu grags pa yin no //
analyzed: skyug pa dang / 'khru ba ni rab tu grags pa yin no //

analyzed: gyen du bshal ba ni sman sngon du song ba can gyi sna la sogs pa las 'dzag par gyur pa'o //

original: sna'i las @168a * //
analyzed: sna'i las @168a * //

original: ni du ba rngub pa'o //
analyzed: ni du ba rngub pa'o //

original: yan lag gi phyogs gcig gi dugs kyang rab tu grags pa yin no //
analyzed: yan lag gi phyogs gcig gi dugs kyang rab tu grags pa yin no //
translated: The “heat of one part of the body” is also well known.

original: snying ga'i phyogs na yongs su gnas pa'i nad kyi gso ba bstan pa ni ma zhu ba'i gnas brjod pa'o //
analyzed: snying ga'i phyogs na yongs su gnas pa'i nad kyi gso ba bstan pa ni ma zhu ba'i gnas brjod pa'o //

analyzed: snying ga'i 'og man chad kyis ni zhu ba'i gnas brjod pa'o //

analyzed: lus kyi phyogs las byung ba 'brum pa 'bras bu'i rnam pa lta bu bshad pa dag ni 'brum bu'o //

original: brjod le'u lag pa la sogs pa las byung ba 'bras kyi bya ba 'chad pa dag ni 'bras kyi brjod le'u yin no //
analyzed: brjod le'u lag pa la sogs pa las byung ba 'bras kyi bya ba 'chad pa dag ni 'bras kyi brjod le'u yin no //

original: ri dag rnams 'khor lo bzhin du rgyu ba ni ri dag 'gro ba yin te /
analyzed: ri dag rnams 'khor lo bzhin du rgyu ba ni ri dag 'gro ba yin te /

original: de'i 'bras bu lung bstan pa la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu lung bstan pa la mkhas par gyur pa'o //

original: khva dag nam mkha' la tshogs shing rgyu ba ni khva'i tshogs yin te /
analyzed: khva dag nam mkha' la tshogs shing rgyu ba ni khva'i tshogs yin te /
translated: The “flock of crows” is a flock of crows flying in the sky.

original: de'i 'bras bu yang shes par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu yang shes par gyur pa'o //
translated: One becomes knowledgeable in its fruit.

original: kos ko'i phyogs 'gul ba la sogs pa gyur pa srid pa ni kos ko zhom pa ste /
analyzed: kos ko'i phyogs 'gul ba la sogs pa gyur pa srid pa ni kos ko zhom pa ste /

original: de'i 'bras bu lung ston pa la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu lung ston pa la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
translated: The result of that is the skill in prophesying.

original: 'phral du so'i phreng ba dag gis lce la 'byor par gyur pa ni lce bzhar ba yin no //
analyzed: 'phral du so'i phreng ba dag gis lce la 'byor par gyur pa ni lce bzhar ba yin no //

original: ro langs ni 'khor lo gnyis dang ldan pa'i shing rta la zhon pa lag pa gnyis kyis ral gri so sor 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: ro langs ni 'khor lo gnyis dang ldan pa'i shing rta la zhon pa lag pa gnyis kyis ral gri so sor 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The zombie is indicated by a chariot with two wheels, mounted by two hands holding swords.

original: ro langs phyed ni 'khor lo gcig pa'i shing rta la zhon cing ral gri gcig 'dzin pas nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: ro langs phyed ni 'khor lo gcig pa'i shing rta la zhon cing ral gri gcig 'dzin pas nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: The half-zombie is indicated by a chariot with one wheel, mounted by one hand holding a sword.

original: dgug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dgug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The summoning, etc. are:

original: dgug pa ni 'byung po dag 'dren par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dgug pa ni 'byung po dag 'dren par byed pa'o //

original: slar gtong ba ni aa rga la sogs pa sbrengs nas gtong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: slar gtong ba ni aa rga la sogs pa sbrengs nas gtong bar byed pa'o //

original: kun nas rmongs par byed pa ni sngas kyis gzhan gyi sems rnam par rmongs pa skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas rmongs par byed pa ni sngas kyis gzhan gyi sems rnam par rmongs pa skyed par byed pa'o //

original: rnam par rmongs pa ni khyad par sngags kyis gzhan gyi yan lag rnam par bshig cing 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rmongs pa ni khyad par sngags kyis gzhan gyi yan lag rnam par bshig cing 'gyur ba'o //

analyzed: rnam par bshig pa ni sngags kho nas ro rgyab la sogs pa 'jig par 'gyur ba'o //

analyzed: sngags kho nas bde ba bskyed pa ni bde bar byas pa yin la /

original: de bzhin du sdug bsngal bar byas pa yin no //🔽sman la sogs pas mngal bskyed pa ni sbrum par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sdug bsngal bar byas pa yin no // sman la sogs pas mngal bskyed pa ni sbrum par byas pa yin no //
translated: The production of pain by means of a spell is a production of pain.🔽The impregnation by means of a spell is an impregnation.

original: me la til la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg byin pa ni til la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg yin no //🔽gser la sogs pa bcug pa ni /
analyzed: me la til la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg byin pa ni til la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg yin no // gser la sogs pa bcug pa ni /
translated: The oblation of sesame seeds by means of a spell is an oblation of sesame seeds.

original: rdzas kyi sbyin sreg yin no //
analyzed: rdzas kyi sbyin sreg yin no //
translated: The oblation of substances by means of a spell is an oblation of substances.🔽The oblation of clarified butter by means of a spell is an oblation of clarified butter.🔽The oblation of sesame oil by means of a spell is an oblation of sesame oil.

original: til mar dang mar bcug pa ni sbyin sreg gi sbyin sreg @168b yin no //
analyzed: til mar dang mar bcug pa ni sbyin sreg gi sbyin sreg @168b yin no //

original: nyi ma la bsnyen pa'am rab tu chags par gyur pa de ni bsnyen pa'i cho ga la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma la bsnyen pa'am rab tu chags par gyur pa de ni bsnyen pa'i cho ga la mkhas pa'o //

original: rgyu skar la phyogs pa dang / lha la phyogs pa dag kyang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: rgyu skar la phyogs pa dang / lha la phyogs pa dag kyang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The same applies to the stars and the gods.

original: dbang phyug gi mchog gi 'dus pa sgrub par byed pa ni spong ba chen po de la mngon par sbyor ba des 'tsho bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang phyug gi mchog gi 'dus pa sgrub par byed pa ni spong ba chen po de la mngon par sbyor ba des 'tsho bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The supreme power of Maheśvara is the cause of the accomplishment of the assembly, because it is applied to that great abandonment and it is the one who makes them live.

original: 'jigs par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'jigs par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The knowledge of the characteristics of the approach of fear, etc.

original: 'jigs par 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid shes pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid shes shing lo nyes dang lo legs pa'i mtshan nyid shes par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'jigs par 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid shes pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid shes shing lo nyes dang lo legs pa'i mtshan nyid shes par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The knowledge of the characteristics of the approach of fear is the knowledge of the characteristics of the approach of famine and the knowledge of the characteristics of the approach of disease. The knowledge of the characteristics of the approach of well-being is the knowledge of the characteristics of the approach of good harvests and the knowledge of the characteristics of the approach of peace.

original: ngan par 'bab pas na char mi 'bab pa ste 'bru nyams par byed pa'o ;
analyzed: ngan par 'bab pas na char mi 'bab pa ste 'bru nyams par byed pa'o ;
translated: The non-falling of rain is the non-falling of rain that destroys crops.

original: / dge bar 'bab pas na char 'bab par 'gyur ba ste 'bru sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: / dge bar 'bab pas na char 'bab par 'gyur ba ste 'bru sgrub par byed pa'o //

original: lha 'khrugs pa dang bdud la sogs pa'i rnam par 'tshe ba las byung ba ni yams yin no //
analyzed: lha 'khrugs pa dang bdud la sogs pa'i rnam par 'tshe ba las byung ba ni yams yin no //

original: cig shos ni bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: cig shos ni bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //

analyzed: nang gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan gyi 'dod pas 'gro ba ni bros par gyur pa yin la /

original: rang gi 'dod pas 'gro ba ni snyegs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pas 'gro ba ni snyegs par gyur pa'o //

original: lam zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lam ni rab tu grags pa'i lam po che yin la /
analyzed: lam zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lam ni rab tu grags pa'i lam po che yin la /

original: rab tu grags pa ma yin pa ni lam gol ba yin no //
analyzed: rab tu grags pa ma yin pa ni lam gol ba yin no //
translated: The non-path is the wrong path.

original: skar ma'i gzugs ltung ba ni skar mda' ltung ba'o //
analyzed: skar ma'i gzugs ltung ba ni skar mda' ltung ba'o //

analyzed: phyogs dang nam mkha'i phyogs shin tu 'od gsal bar gyur pa ni phyogs tshig pa'o //

original: bar snang la mi bzad pa'i sgra 'byung ba ni lha'i rnga bo che dag yin no //
analyzed: bar snang la mi bzad pa'i sgra 'byung ba ni lha'i rnga bo che dag yin no //

original: rang gi yon tan sgrub pa ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi yon tan sgrub pa ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o //
