original: zas bza' bar bya ba ni zas longs spyod par bya'o //
analyzed: zas bza' bar bya ba ni zas longs spyod par bya'o //
translated: One should eat the food that is to be eaten.

original: dpya ba ni 'dod pa ma yin pa ston pa'i tshig brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dpya ba ni 'dod pa ma yin pa ston pa'i tshig brjod pa'o //
translated: To revile is to utter words that show contempt.

original: gzhon rabs kyi dus yol bar gyur ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gzhon rabs kyi dus yol bar gyur ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The phrase “when the time of youth has passed” and so on.

original: mang ba nyid kyi phyir ji srid dge slong dag dang / gzhon rabs su rnam par gnas pa dag gis zas thob par gyur pa de srid du dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis zas zos shing zas zos nas kyang yon bshad par byed pa dang /
analyzed: mang ba nyid kyi phyir ji srid dge slong dag dang / gzhon rabs su rnam par gnas pa dag gis zas thob par gyur pa de srid du dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis zas zos shing zas zos nas kyang yon bshad par byed pa dang /
translated: As long as the monks and the young people remain, as long as they obtain food, the senior monk of the saṅgha eats the food and, after eating, he recites the benediction.

original: dge slong gzhon pa dag yon bshad par gyur pa na zas ma zos la /
analyzed: dge slong gzhon pa dag yon bshad par gyur pa na zas ma zos la /
translated: When the young monks recite the benediction, they have not yet eaten.

original: yon bshad pa yongs su rdzogs pa na yang zas kyi dus las 'das par gyur pa de'i phyir dus las 'das pa zhes bstan to //
analyzed: yon bshad pa yongs su rdzogs pa na yang zas kyi dus las 'das par gyur pa de'i phyir dus las 'das pa zhes bstan to //
translated: When the recitation of the benediction is completed, the time for eating has passed. For that reason, it is called “after the time has passed.”

original: don mi go ba zhes bya ba la don yongs su shes pa'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: don mi go ba zhes bya ba la don yongs su shes pa'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa'o //
translated: “One who does not understand the meaning” is one who is not disposed to understand the meaning.

original: sgra mi thos pa ni sgra so sor rig pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra mi thos pa ni sgra so sor rig pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: “One who does not hear the sound” is one who is not disposed to understand the sound.

original: gral tshar gnyis su zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gral tshar gnyis su zhes bya ba la /
translated: In two rows means:

original: ji ltar gral bshams pa de bzhin du gral gnyis pas rgan rabs dang nye ba'i mthar son par gyur pa de bas na shin tu thag nye bar gnas pa'i gsar bu don so sor rig par 'gyur zhing sgra so sor rig par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gral bshams pa de bzhin du gral gnyis pas rgan rabs dang nye ba'i mthar son par gyur pa de bas na shin tu thag nye bar gnas pa'i gsar bu don so sor rig par 'gyur zhing sgra so sor rig par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: just as the rows are arranged, the second row is at the end of the first row, and the first row is at the end of the second row. Therefore, the sound is heard very clearly by the young men who are seated in the first row.

original: rib ma'i rtsa zhes bya ba ni me tog gi rib ma'i mtha' phyogs su gyur pa'am /
analyzed: rib ma'i rtsa zhes bya ba ni me tog gi rib ma'i mtha' phyogs su gyur pa'am /
translated: The edge of the curtain means: the edge of the curtain of flowers, or

original: rib ma'i rtsa ba ni khyim gyi tshar dang nye ba'o //
analyzed: rib ma'i rtsa ba ni khyim gyi tshar dang nye ba'o //
translated: the edge of the curtain of the house.

original: mi dge ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par @181b smin pa mi 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir 'dod pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: mi dge ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par @181b smin pa mi 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir 'dod pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: Non-virtuous means: discursive thoughts of desire, etc., because they are undesirable in terms of their karmic maturation.

original: mi dge ba de la rnam par rtog par byed do //
analyzed: mi dge ba de la rnam par rtog par byed do //
translated: One discursively thinks about that non-virtue.

original: 'phags pa'i skye bos smad pa nyid kyi phyir sdig pa yin la /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i skye bos smad pa nyid kyi phyir sdig pa yin la /
translated: It is sinful because it is despised by the noble ones.

original: 'dun pa'i 'dod chags la brten nas skyes pa'i phyir chags pa la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dun pa'i 'dod chags la brten nas skyes pa'i phyir chags pa la brten pa yin no //
translated: It is based on attachment because it arises in dependence on desirous attachment.

original: sa bon tsha ba lta bu zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sa bon tsha ba lta bu zhes bya ba la /
translated: The example of a hot seed.

original: tsha ba ni kha ba'am rno ba yin te /
analyzed: tsha ba ni kha ba'am rno ba yin te /
translated: Hot means sour or sharp.

original: tsha ba'i sa bon ni tsha ba'i sa bon yin pas na bdag nyid tsha ba'i 'bras bu'i sa bon ltar zhes bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: tsha ba'i sa bon ni tsha ba'i sa bon yin pas na bdag nyid tsha ba'i 'bras bu'i sa bon ltar zhes bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: Since a hot seed is a hot seed, it is taught that it is like a seed of a hot fruit.

original: sa bon tsha ba byed pa ma yin pa sa bon tsha bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid sa bon tsha ba ltar rang nyid kyi sems gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: sa bon tsha ba byed pa ma yin pa sa bon tsha bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid sa bon tsha ba ltar rang nyid kyi sems gyur pa yin no //
translated: Since a non-hot seed is a hot seed, it is like a hot seed.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bdag nyid dring ba yin la /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bdag nyid dring ba yin la /
translated: Since it is endowed with the conception of the five sense objects, it is itself a fool.

original: reg pa'i skye mched drug gis sdom pa ma yin pas bsdams pa'i phyir bdag nyid zag pa yin no //
analyzed: reg pa'i skye mched drug gis sdom pa ma yin pas bsdams pa'i phyir bdag nyid zag pa yin no //
translated: Since it is bound by the six sense bases of contact, it is itself a leper.

original: reg pa'i skye mched drug po dag gis rtag tu 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zag par byed pa'i phyir sdig pa'i chos 'dod chags la sogs pa ni sbrang bu yin te /
analyzed: reg pa'i skye mched drug po dag gis rtag tu 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zag par byed pa'i phyir sdig pa'i chos 'dod chags la sogs pa ni sbrang bu yin te /
translated: Since the six sense bases of contact always cause the defilements of attachment and so on to flow, the sinful dharmas of attachment and so on are flies.

original: rang dbang du gnas pa'i ro myong bar byed do //🔽rang gi 'dod pas yongs su longs spyod pa ni mngon par bldags pa'am /
analyzed: rang dbang du gnas pa'i ro myong bar byed do // rang gi 'dod pas yongs su longs spyod pa ni mngon par bldags pa'am /
translated: One experiences the taste of independence.🔽One enjoys it as one wishes.

original: rgyun gyis de la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun gyis de la gnas pa'o //
translated: One chews it well, or one savors it by remaining in it for a long time.

original: 'di la gnas yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di la gnas yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la gnas yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di la gnas yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no place for it here.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni ma bstan pa'i gtso bor gyur pa'i dge slong 'ga' zhig go //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni ma bstan pa'i gtso bor gyur pa'i dge slong 'ga' zhig go //
translated: Another is a certain monk who is not mentioned as being foremost, but who is a great man.

original: de'i tshig bla dag so zhes bya ba ni de'i ming ston par byed pa'o //🔽'dun pa'i 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no //🔽gnod sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshig bla dag so zhes bya ba ni de'i ming ston par byed pa'o // 'dun pa'i 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no // gnod sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: His name is given as a good man.🔽The discursive thought associated with the passion of desire is the discursive thought of desire.🔽The discursive thought associated with malice is the discursive thought of malice.

original: gzhan la co 'dri ba dang 'tshe ba dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la co 'dri ba dang 'tshe ba dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: The discursive thought associated with the desire to harm and to injure is the discursive thought of harm.

original: dga' bar byed mngon par 'dod par byed pa yin pas na 'dod pa yin la /
analyzed: dga' bar byed mngon par 'dod par byed pa yin pas na 'dod pa yin la /
translated: They are desirable because they are delightful and are objects of desire.

original: 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyi sgo nas yon tan du byed cing yang dang yang du goms par byed pas na yon tan yin no //
analyzed: 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyi sgo nas yon tan du byed cing yang dang yang du goms par byed pas na yon tan yin no //
translated: They are qualities because one is attached to them through the desire for them and one repeatedly cultivates them as qualities.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i yul la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags ni don du gnyer ba'i 'dod chags so //🔽mig gis reg pa'i skye mched ces bya ba la reg pa'i @182a * //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i yul la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags ni don du gnyer ba'i 'dod chags so // mig gis reg pa'i skye mched ces bya ba la reg pa'i @182a * //
translated: The desire for the five sense objects is the desire for sense objects.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because it is the basis for the generation of the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because it is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.

original: skye mched skyed par byed pa'i gnas yin pas na reg pa'i skye mched yin pa la mig kho na reg pa'i skye mched yin pas mig gi reg pa'i skye mched yin zhing /🔽mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: skye mched skyed par byed pa'i gnas yin pas na reg pa'i skye mched yin pa la mig kho na reg pa'i skye mched yin pas mig gi reg pa'i skye mched yin zhing / mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.

original: gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //🔽de bzhin du rna ba la sogs pa'i skye mched kyang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //🔽de bzhin du rna ba la sogs pa'i skye mched kyang rig par bya'o //
translated: The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.🔽The eye is the sense base of contact because the eye is the sense base of contact.

original: sdom pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni yul ma yin pa las ldog pa med pa ni sdom pa ma yin pa yin te /
analyzed: sdom pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni yul ma yin pa las ldog pa med pa ni sdom pa ma yin pa yin te /
translated: Non-restraint is the absence of restraint with regard to the improper objects.

original: des bsdams pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: des bsdams pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: One who possesses that is said to be “restrained by non-restraint.”

original: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la sems rjes su 'jug pa ni sems la brten nas 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la sems rjes su 'jug pa ni sems la brten nas 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The mind engages in evil, non-virtuous dharmas by following the mind.

original: ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: What exists?

original: smras pa / brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba yod na'o //
analyzed: smras pa / brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba yod na'o //
translated: It is said: when covetousness and mental dissatisfaction exist.

original: de dag yul gang la zhe na /
analyzed: de dag yul gang la zhe na /
translated: What are their objects?

original: smras pa / 'jig rten te nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: smras pa / 'jig rten te nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //
translated: It is said: the world, i.e., the five appropriative aggregates.

original: mig dang rna ba gang ma sbas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mig dang rna ba gang ma sbas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for the phrase “the eyes and ears are not guarded,”

original: mig dang rna ba yul la rab tu 'jug par byed pa'i phyir mig dang rna ba ma sbas pa yin no //
analyzed: mig dang rna ba yul la rab tu 'jug par byed pa'i phyir mig dang rna ba ma sbas pa yin no //
translated: the eyes and ears are not guarded because they engage with objects.

original: 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyis gzir ba ni gnod par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyis gzir ba ni gnod par gyur pa'o //
translated: Those who are oppressed by the desire for sensual pleasure are those who are harmed.

original: de la gnas pa ni bde bar gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de la gnas pa ni bde bar gnas pa ste /
translated: Those who abide in that are those who abide in comfort.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yin la /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yin la /
translated: They abide in nirvana.

original: bde bar gnas pa las dge slong de ring du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: bde bar gnas pa las dge slong de ring du gyur pa yin no //
translated: The monk is far removed from the happy state.

original: gnod pa ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal te skye ba la sogs pa yin la /
analyzed: gnod pa ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal te skye ba la sogs pa yin la /
translated: The harm is the suffering of cyclic existence, birth, etc.

original: de'i nang na gnas pa'i sgo nas de ni gnod pa la nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i nang na gnas pa'i sgo nas de ni gnod pa la nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: He is close to the harm by remaining in the midst of it.

original: gang 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phan yon ston par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phan yon ston par byed pa yin no //
translated: The phrase “whatever he does” and so on shows the benefits.

original: nang gi gnas ni rang gi sems rtse gcig pa yin la /
analyzed: nang gi gnas ni rang gi sems rtse gcig pa yin la /
translated: The inner state is the one-pointed mind.

original: sbyor bar byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das la sbyor bar byed pa pos bdag nyid nges par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: sbyor bar byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das la sbyor bar byed pa pos bdag nyid nges par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The application is the application to the Blessed One, the application to the self.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What does he do?

original: smras pa / mngon shes te shin tu shes nas so //
analyzed: smras pa / mngon shes te shin tu shes nas so //
translated: He has superknowledge, i.e., he knows well.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: bsam pa la sogs pa shugs kyis rtogs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa la sogs pa shugs kyis rtogs par gyur pa'o //
translated: The intention, etc., are understood by implication.

original: bde bar gnas zhes bya ba ni bde bar nyal ba ste /
analyzed: bde bar gnas zhes bya ba ni bde bar nyal ba ste /
translated: The happy state is the happy sleep.

original: 'di ni yang srid par mi 'jug pa'i phan yon gzhan yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni yang srid par mi 'jug pa'i phan yon gzhan yin no //
translated: This is another benefit, the non-entry into a new existence.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What does he do?

original: smras pa / yang dag pa'i bka'i go 'phang gis so //
analyzed: smras pa / yang dag pa'i bka'i go 'phang gis so //
translated: He said: “By the state of the true teaching.”

original: go 'phang khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: go 'phang khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the special state?

original: skyes bu ngan pas ma bsnyen pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu ngan pas ma bsnyen pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
translated: He said: “It is not frequented by bad people,” and so on.

original: smad par bya ba'i skyes bu ni skyes bu ngan pa ste /
analyzed: smad par bya ba'i skyes bu ni skyes bu ngan pa ste /
translated: A bad person is one who is contemptible.

original: le lo la sogs pa'i nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: le lo la sogs pa'i nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is endowed with the faults of laziness, etc.

original: des @182b thob par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ma brten pa'o //
analyzed: des @182b thob par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ma brten pa'o //
translated: It is not frequented because it is not to be attained by him.

original: go 'phang ni thar pa zhes bya ba'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: go 'phang ni thar pa zhes bya ba'i gnas yin no //
translated: The state is the abode called liberation.

original: 'phags pa ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis so //
analyzed: 'phags pa ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis so //
translated: The noble ones are the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones.

original: legs bshad ni mdzes par rab tu bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: legs bshad ni mdzes par rab tu bshad pa yin no //
translated: The good explanation is the beautiful exposition.

original: spyod yul ma yin pa lnga zhes bya ba ni dge slong 'gro ba tshul ma yin pa'i phyir spyod yul ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: spyod yul ma yin pa lnga zhes bya ba ni dge slong 'gro ba tshul ma yin pa'i phyir spyod yul ma yin pa'o //
translated: The five improper domains are improper domains because they are not the domain of a monk who is going in the right way.

original: rol mo'i gnas ni rol mo mkhan gyi gnas so //
analyzed: rol mo'i gnas ni rol mo mkhan gyi gnas so //
translated: The domain of music is the domain of musicians.

original: smad 'tshong ma'i gnas ni 'dir 'dod pa dag 'jug par byed pa'i zhes bya ba de'i dbang du byas nas smad 'tshong ma'i khyim yin no //🔽chang 'tshong gi gnas ni myos byed kyi btung ba'i khang pa yin no //
analyzed: smad 'tshong ma'i gnas ni 'dir 'dod pa dag 'jug par byed pa'i zhes bya ba de'i dbang du byas nas smad 'tshong ma'i khyim yin no // chang 'tshong gi gnas ni myos byed kyi btung ba'i khang pa yin no //
translated: The brothel is the house of prostitution, which is the place where one engages in sexual intercourse for the sake of money.🔽The tavern is the house of liquor, which is the place where one drinks liquor.

original: gdol pa'i gnas ni gdol pa'i khyim yin no //
analyzed: gdol pa'i gnas ni gdol pa'i khyim yin no //
translated: The slaughterhouse is the house of butchers, which is the place where animals are killed.

original: ji ltar bshams pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'gro ba'i dge slong des bshams par gyur pa de kho na bzhin du des btang snyoms su gzhag par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bshams pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'gro ba'i dge slong des bshams par gyur pa de kho na bzhin du des btang snyoms su gzhag par gyur pa'o //
translated: He should remain indifferent to the situation just as it was arranged by the monk who went there.

original: sngon gyi las kyis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sngon gyi las kyis zhes bya ba la /
translated: The phrase “due to his previous karma” means

original: sngon gyi las ni 'dir las rnying pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi las ni 'dir las rnying pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: that his previous karma should be understood as his old karma.

original: sbrul ni sbrul gyi so gang yin pa de gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i tshe dug yod pa'i phyir sbrul gdug pa'o //
analyzed: sbrul ni sbrul gyi so gang yin pa de gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i tshe dug yod pa'i phyir sbrul gdug pa'o //
translated: A snake is a poisonous snake, because it has poison when it bites others.

original: 'bru mar zhes bya ba ni rkang pa bsku ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bru mar zhes bya ba ni rkang pa bsku ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Oil is for the purpose of anointing the feet.

original: gang sngon gyi skye ba des tshe thung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pa de len pa nyid kyi nyes pa yin te /
analyzed: gang sngon gyi skye ba des tshe thung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pa de len pa nyid kyi nyes pa yin te /
translated: The fault of taking up karma that results in a short life is the cause.

original: des bskyed pa ni 'phangs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: des bskyed pa ni 'phangs par gyur pa'o //
translated: Generated by that is the projecting cause.

original: non pa ni g-yo 'gul byed pa'i nus pa chung ba'o //
analyzed: non pa ni g-yo 'gul byed pa'i nus pa chung ba'o //
translated: Overwhelmed is the weak ability to move.

original: lus ma nus pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gnod pa ni gzir ba'o //
analyzed: lus ma nus pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gnod pa ni gzir ba'o //
translated: The body is afflicted by the pain of suffering.

original: shi bar gyur pa ni dus las 'das par gyur pa'o //🔽de gnyis kyis zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'i drug pa yin te /
analyzed: shi bar gyur pa ni dus las 'das par gyur pa'o // de gnyis kyis zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'i drug pa yin te /
translated: Death is the passing beyond the time.

original: de gnyis las gcig gis so //
analyzed: de gnyis las gcig gis so //
translated: From those two is from one of those two.

original: rdul gzan byin bzhin du zhes bya ba ni des rdul gzan mtshan mo'i gos kyi tshul du bgos pa de'i phyir de skad ces bstan to //
analyzed: rdul gzan byin bzhin du zhes bya ba ni des rdul gzan mtshan mo'i gos kyi tshul du bgos pa de'i phyir de skad ces bstan to //
translated: Like a gift of dust is like a gift of dust in the form of night clothes.

original: de ltar mi sdug par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'gyur ba thob par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar mi sdug par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'gyur ba thob par gyur pa'o //
translated: Thus, it becomes ugly is thus, it becomes a state of change.

original: bsdum par rung ba zhes bya ba ni sbyor du rung bas na bsdum du rung ba'o //
analyzed: bsdum par rung ba zhes bya ba ni sbyor du rung bas na bsdum du rung ba'o //
translated: Suitable for reconciliation is suitable for union, thus suitable for reconciliation.

original: 'dum par mi 'gyur gyi zhes bya ba ni de nyes pa gzhan yod pa'i phyir 'dum par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dum par mi 'gyur gyi zhes bya ba ni de nyes pa gzhan yod pa'i phyir 'dum par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: “It will not be reconciled” means that it should not be reconciled because of the other’s fault.

original: gos gcig gang la yod pa de ni gos gcig pa ste /
analyzed: gos gcig gang la yod pa de ni gos gcig pa ste /
translated: “One who wears one piece of clothing” is one who wears one piece of clothing.

original: gos gcig gon pas gzhan la phyag mi bya zhing gos gcig gyon pa la yang phyag mi bya la /
analyzed: gos gcig gon pas gzhan la phyag mi bya zhing gos gcig gyon pa la yang phyag mi bya la /
translated: One who wears one piece of clothing should not bow down to another, nor should one bow down to one who wears one piece of clothing.

original: gos gcig gyon pas kyang gzhan gyi phyag bdag gir @183a * //🔽mi bya'o // gang de la zhes bya ba ni tha mal pa'i gnas la'o //
analyzed: gos gcig gyon pas kyang gzhan gyi phyag bdag gir @183a * // mi bya'o // gang de la zhes bya ba ni tha mal pa'i gnas la'o //
translated: One who wears one piece of clothing should not accept another’s bow.🔽“One who is in a normal state” means one who is in an ordinary state.

original: mngon sum du phyogs pas 'dug shig ces bya ba ni bstan pa'i gnas la mngon sum du phyogs pas 'dug par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum du phyogs pas 'dug shig ces bya ba ni bstan pa'i gnas la mngon sum du phyogs pas 'dug par bya ba yin no //
translated: “One should sit facing the direction” means one should sit facing the direction of the teaching.

original: las bdag gir byed pa la dmigs nas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: las bdag gir byed pa la dmigs nas zhes bya ba la /
translated: “Observing one’s own actions” means

original: bdag nyid kyi las la rag lus pa'am /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi las la rag lus pa'am /
translated: one’s own actions depend on oneself,

original: rang gis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu longs spyod du rung bar bdag nyid kyis shes nas zas la sogs pa'i tshod rig par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rang gis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu longs spyod du rung bar bdag nyid kyis shes nas zas la sogs pa'i tshod rig par bya ba yin no //
translated: or one’s own actions are suitable to be enjoyed as the result of one’s own actions. Having understood this, one should know the proper amount of food and so on.

original: rdul gyis gang ba ni rdul gyis khyab par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rdul gyis gang ba ni rdul gyis khyab par gyur pa'o //
translated: Covered with dust means covered with dust.

original: lag pa nas bzung ba'i sgo nas nyam nga ba las bton pa ni lag pa nas bzung ba yin no //🔽sran ma sha las byas pa'am zhes bya ba ni sran ma sha la sogs pa las byas pa'am /
analyzed: lag pa nas bzung ba'i sgo nas nyam nga ba las bton pa ni lag pa nas bzung ba yin no // sran ma sha las byas pa'am zhes bya ba ni sran ma sha la sogs pa las byas pa'am /
translated: Taking by the hand means taking by the hand in order to rescue from a dangerous place.🔽Made of beans means made of beans, etc.

original: 'bras btags pa las bsgrubs pa'i bca' ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras btags pa las bsgrubs pa'i bca' ba'o //
translated: Prepared from flour means prepared from flour, etc.

original: tshod rig par byos shig ces bya ba ni len pa na ji ltar nye gnas dang slob ma la gnod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar tshod shes par bya ba yin no //🔽gtsang sbyor ba ni zas kyi zhal ta pa'o //
analyzed: tshod rig par byos shig ces bya ba ni len pa na ji ltar nye gnas dang slob ma la gnod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar tshod shes par bya ba yin no // gtsang sbyor ba ni zas kyi zhal ta pa'o //
translated: Be moderate means be moderate in taking so as not to harm the attendant or disciple.🔽The one who prepares the food means the one who serves the food.

original: 'bru mar gyi snod ces bya ba ni pags pa las byas pa 'bru mar gyi snod kyi ko sku'o //
analyzed: 'bru mar gyi snod ces bya ba ni pags pa las byas pa 'bru mar gyi snod kyi ko sku'o //
translated: Oil vessel means a leather bag for oil.

original: kha ton klogs shig ces bya ba ni klog tu bcug pa yin no //
analyzed: kha ton klogs shig ces bya ba ni klog tu bcug pa yin no //
translated: Recite means make recite.🔽On a lotus means on a lotus leaf.

original: autpala la 'am zhes bya ba'am gyi sgra ni gzhan gyi don du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: autpala la 'am zhes bya ba'am gyi sgra ni gzhan gyi don du blta bar bya'o //
translated: Or means for the sake of another.

original: ji ltar chu zhes bya ba ni ji lta ji ltar chu la 'phel bar 'gyur bde lta de ltar autpala la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar chu zhes bya ba ni ji lta ji ltar chu la 'phel bar 'gyur bde lta de ltar autpala la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the water increases, so too the lotus increases.

original: khyim ste bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim bshad par gyur pa'i nyes pa gang dag gis sun 'byin par byed cing ma dad bar byed pa de dag gi ni khyim sun 'byin pa yin no //
analyzed: khyim ste bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim bshad par gyur pa'i nyes pa gang dag gis sun 'byin par byed cing ma dad bar byed pa de dag gi ni khyim sun 'byin pa yin no //
translated: The householders are the houses of brahmins and householders. The faults that are the causes of contempt and lack of faith in them are the faults of the householders.

original: ji ltar de dag khyim sun 'byin pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de dag khyim sun 'byin pa yin zhe na /
translated: How are they the faults of the householders?

original: smras pa / gang gi phyir sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / gang gi phyir sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa yin no //
translated: It is said: because they engage in sinful dharmas.

original: ji ltar sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa yin zhe na /
translated: How do they engage in sinful dharmas?

original: de dag bud med kyi yul dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te //
analyzed: de dag bud med kyi yul dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te //
translated: They say: with women, etc.

original: 'du 'dzi la sogs pa'i tshig gi bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin du rig par bya'o //🔽snod gcig gi nang du zhes bya ba ni snod chen po gcig gi nang du'am /
analyzed: 'du 'dzi la sogs pa'i tshig gi bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin du rig par bya'o // snod gcig gi nang du zhes bya ba ni snod chen po gcig gi nang du'am /
translated: The explanation of the words distraction, etc. should be understood as before.🔽In one vessel means in one large vessel,

original: rdo'i snod gcig la'o //
analyzed: rdo'i snod gcig la'o //
translated: or in one stone vessel.

original: me tog thogs pa ni thod dam rna ba dag la'o //
analyzed: me tog thogs pa ni thod dam rna ba dag la'o //
translated: Holding flowers means holding them in the hand or on the ear.

original: bya dga' 'byin pa ni mang du byin pas dga' bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bya dga' 'byin pa ni mang du byin pas dga' bar gyur pa'o //
translated: Giving a reward means being delighted by giving much.

original: rgyug pa ni shugs kyis 'gro ba'o //🔽mchong ba ni rgal ba'o //
analyzed: rgyug pa ni shugs kyis 'gro ba'o // mchong ba ni rgal ba'o //
translated: Running means going with speed.🔽Jumping means leaping.

original: rab tu mtshang ba ni steng du mchong ba'o //🔽brla gcig g-yob pa ni brla sgyur byed pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu mtshang ba ni steng du mchong ba'o // brla gcig g-yob pa ni brla sgyur byed pa'o //
translated: Leaping well means leaping up.🔽Waving one thigh means moving the thigh.

original: @183b dpung pa gcig bskyod pa ni dpung pa sgyur bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: @183b dpung pa gcig bskyod pa ni dpung pa sgyur bar byed pa'o //
translated: Shaking one shoulder means moving the shoulder.

original: nya bzhin du sgyur bar byed pa ni nya ltar 'gyur zhing 'phar pa'o //
analyzed: nya bzhin du sgyur bar byed pa ni nya ltar 'gyur zhing 'phar pa'o //
translated: Moving like a fish means moving and jumping like a fish.

original: chu la rdo 'phar 'phen pa ni chu'i steng du rdo'i dum bu 'phen par byed pa'o //
analyzed: chu la rdo 'phar 'phen pa ni chu'i steng du rdo'i dum bu 'phen par byed pa'o //
translated: Throwing a stone on water means throwing a piece of stone on the water.

original: lag pa gcig gis bsnun pas chu'i steng du bsnun pa ni chu sgra 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa gcig gis bsnun pas chu'i steng du bsnun pa ni chu sgra 'byin pa'o //
translated: Hitting the water with one hand means hitting the water with one hand.

original: lag pa gnyis kyis rdeg cing bsnun pa ni chu rnga rdung ba yin no //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis kyis rdeg cing bsnun pa ni chu rnga rdung ba yin no //
translated: Beating and hitting with both hands means beating the water with both hands.

original: kha rlung gis bkang ba la lag pa'i thal mo gcig gis rdeg cing bsnun pa ni kha'i rnga rdung ba'am /
analyzed: kha rlung gis bkang ba la lag pa'i thal mo gcig gis rdeg cing bsnun pa ni kha'i rnga rdung ba'am /
translated: Blowing a trumpet with the mouth means to blow a trumpet with the mouth by filling it with air and striking it with the palm of the hand.

original: kha'i sgo nas rnga bo che'i sgra ltar sgrogs pa ni kha'i rnga rdung pa yin no //
analyzed: kha'i sgo nas rnga bo che'i sgra ltar sgrogs pa ni kha'i rnga rdung pa yin no //
translated: Blowing a trumpet with the mouth means to make a sound like a large drum with the mouth.

original: kha dang lag pa'i sbyor ba las dung gi sgra 'byin pa ni kha'i dung 'bud pa'o //
analyzed: kha dang lag pa'i sbyor ba las dung gi sgra 'byin pa ni kha'i dung 'bud pa'o //
translated: Blowing a trumpet with the mouth means to make the sound of a conch with the mouth and hands.

original: kha'i sgo nas rnga'i sgra sgrogs pa ni kha'i rnga len par byed pa'am /
analyzed: kha'i sgo nas rnga'i sgra sgrogs pa ni kha'i rnga len par byed pa'am /
translated: Blowing a trumpet with the mouth means to make the sound of a drum with the mouth.

original: kha rlung gis bkang ba lag pa gnyis kyis brdegs shing bsnun pa'o //
analyzed: kha rlung gis bkang ba lag pa gnyis kyis brdegs shing bsnun pa'o //
translated: Blowing a trumpet with the mouth means to fill the mouth with air and strike it with both hands.

original: dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni dge sbyong dang tshul mthun pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni dge sbyong dang tshul mthun pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Not the work of an ascetic means not in accordance with the conduct of an ascetic.

original: spyod lam zhes bya ba ni lus kyi spyod lam mo //🔽spyod pa zhes bya ba ni log pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: spyod lam zhes bya ba ni lus kyi spyod lam mo // spyod pa zhes bya ba ni log pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa'o //
translated: Posture means the posture of the body.🔽Conduct means engaging in wrong conduct.

original: log par zhugs pas na zhes bya ba ni tshul ma yin pa'i bya ba la kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: log par zhugs pas na zhes bya ba ni tshul ma yin pa'i bya ba la kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: Engaging in what is contrary means engaging in what is improper.

original: spangs te zhes bya ba ni yongs su dor ba'o //
analyzed: spangs te zhes bya ba ni yongs su dor ba'o //
translated: Abandoning means completely giving up.

original: 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'ga' zhig tu dge 'dun lhag ma'i gnas ngan len smra ba la sogs pa dang / 'ga' zhig tu ji ltar gos kyis bar du chod pa'i bud med kyi yul gyi lus la reg pa bdag gir byed pa'i nyes pa sbom po dang /
analyzed: 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'ga' zhig tu dge 'dun lhag ma'i gnas ngan len smra ba la sogs pa dang / 'ga' zhig tu ji ltar gos kyis bar du chod pa'i bud med kyi yul gyi lus la reg pa bdag gir byed pa'i nyes pa sbom po dang /
translated: It is contradictory means that in some cases it is a downfall to speak of the faults of a monk who has committed a partial defeat, and in some cases it is a serious violation to take possession of the body of a woman with whom one should not copulate, even if she is covered by a cloth.

original: kha cig tu myos par byed pa 'thung ba la sogs pa ltung byed 'ba' zhig pa dang / kha cig tu gar la sogs pa'i nyes byas dag la 'dir ci rigs par 'gal tshabs can gyi don du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: kha cig tu myos par byed pa 'thung ba la sogs pa ltung byed 'ba' zhig pa dang / kha cig tu gar la sogs pa'i nyes byas dag la 'dir ci rigs par 'gal tshabs can gyi don du blta bar bya'o //
translated: In some cases it is a minor offense to dance and so on, and in some cases it is a downfall that is an immediate offense to drink alcohol and so on.

original: nyams par byed pa ni 'dir zhing 'jig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: nyams par byed pa ni 'dir zhing 'jig par byed pa'o //
translated: Here, to destroy means to destroy the field.

original: rnam par 'jig par byed pa ni kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal 'jig par byad pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'jig par byed pa ni kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal 'jig par byad pa'o //
translated: To devastate means to destroy the monastery and the park.

original: gsod par byed pa ni 'dis phongs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gsod par byed pa ni 'dis phongs par byed pa'o //
translated: To kill means to cause poverty.

original: yang na nyams par byed pa ni phyi rol gyi cha byad 'jig par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: yang na nyams par byed pa ni phyi rol gyi cha byad 'jig par byed pa yin la /
translated: Or else, “to destroy” means to destroy external property,

original: rnam par bshig pa ni nang gi yo byad 'jig pa yin zhing srog bcad pa 'dis phongs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par bshig pa ni nang gi yo byad 'jig pa yin zhing srog bcad pa 'dis phongs par byed pa'o //
translated: “to annihilate” means to destroy internal property, and “to kill” means to deprive of life.

original: gnod pa chung ngam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa snga ma dang 'dra'o //🔽phyin ci ma log pa gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngag gi 'bras bu ston par mdzad pa'i @184a * //
analyzed: gnod pa chung ngam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa snga ma dang 'dra'o // phyin ci ma log pa gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngag gi 'bras bu ston par mdzad pa'i @184a * //
translated: “Are you well?” and so on are explained as before.

original: ngang tshul can te /
analyzed: ngang tshul can te /
translated: “He speaks without error” means that he is of the nature of one who teaches the result of speech without error.

original: bden pa gsung ba zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: bden pa gsung ba zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: “He speaks the truth” is what is intended.

original: gcig tu nges pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dir khyod mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po gcig tu nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig tu nges pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dir khyod mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po gcig tu nges pa ma yin te /
translated: “He is not definite” means that the thing you desire is not definite.

original: ji ltar khyod 'dod pa de kho na bzhin du lung bstan par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar khyod 'dod pa de kho na bzhin du lung bstan par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: You are not able to declare it just as you desire.

original: rtsa ba la'i mchod rten zhes bya ba la rtsa ba la zhes bya ba ni mi 'ga' zhig gis byas pa'i mchod rten no //
analyzed: rtsa ba la'i mchod rten zhes bya ba la rtsa ba la zhes bya ba ni mi 'ga' zhig gis byas pa'i mchod rten no //
translated: The “root caitya” is a caitya made by a certain man.

original: bri ba zhes bya ba ni yongs su nyams pa dang mthun pas na bri ba yin la /
analyzed: bri ba zhes bya ba ni yongs su nyams pa dang mthun pas na bri ba yin la /
translated: “ Diminution” is a decrease in the excellence of one’s spiritual practice.

original: bri ba ma yin pa ni mi 'bri ba ste yongs su bri ba dang 'gal zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bri ba ma yin pa ni mi 'bri ba ste yongs su bri ba dang 'gal zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “ Non-diminution” is the opposite of that.

original: bri ba ni 'dir 'byor pa nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: bri ba ni 'dir 'byor pa nyams pa yin no //
translated: “ Diminution” here means a decrease in excellence.

original: yi dam du bcas nas zhes bya ba ni sems kyis lhag par spyad par bya ba nyid du 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: yi dam du bcas nas zhes bya ba ni sems kyis lhag par spyad par bya ba nyid du 'dzin pa'o //
translated: “ Having made a vow” means having taken up the practice in one’s mind.

original: 'jug par byed pa na zhes bya ba ni de'i yul dang mthun par 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug par byed pa na zhes bya ba ni de'i yul dang mthun par 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: “ When one engages in it” means when one engages in it in accordance with the object.

original: snang na zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa kun du spyod pa'i sgo nas yul bri dzi dag la de dag gsal bar snang bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: snang na zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa kun du spyod pa'i sgo nas yul bri dzi dag la de dag gsal bar snang bar gyur pa'o //
translated: “ When it appears” means when the object appears clearly to one who is engaged in the practice of reasoning.

original: phyogs gcig la kun du spyod pa'i dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir tshig gnyis pa bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: phyogs gcig la kun du spyod pa'i dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir tshig gnyis pa bzung ba yin no //
translated: The second phrase is used to avoid the doubt that one might engage in the practice only partially.

original: 'phel zhes bya ba ni 'byor pa rnam par 'phel ba la 'dir 'phel ba'i sgras bstan to //
analyzed: 'phel zhes bya ba ni 'byor pa rnam par 'phel ba la 'dir 'phel ba'i sgras bstan to //
translated: The word increase is used here for the increase of prosperity.

original: legs so zhes bya ba ni 'dir rigs pa'o //
analyzed: legs so zhes bya ba ni 'dir rigs pa'o //
translated: The word good is used here for propriety.

original: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bos nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bos nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Having addressed the venerable Ananda, etc.

original: ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun dga' bo la 'dri ba mdzad de /
analyzed: ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun dga' bo la 'dri ba mdzad de /
translated: How is it that the Lord asks the noble Ananda?

original: dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mkhyen pa ni gzhan la 'dri ba mdzad pa regs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mkhyen pa ni gzhan la 'dri ba mdzad pa regs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not proper for one who knows the reality of all things to ask others, thinking I do not know.

original: 'di la bla ma dag 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi don dang / gang dag bcom ldan 'das la thams cad mkhyen pa dang sangs rgyas ma grub pa de dag yid ches par bya ba'i don dang / 'phags pa kun dga' bo'i spobs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: 'di la bla ma dag 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi don dang / gang dag bcom ldan 'das la thams cad mkhyen pa dang sangs rgyas ma grub pa de dag yid ches par bya ba'i don dang / 'phags pa kun dga' bo'i spobs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par ston par mdzad do //
translated: Here, the teachers explain that it is for the sake of worldly convention, for the sake of convincing those who have not established the omniscience and Buddhahood of the Blessed One, and for the sake of demonstrating the eloquence of the noble Ananda, and so on.

original: yang dang yang du 'du ba zhes bya ba ni yul gyi bya bar dpyod par gyur pas yang dang yang du gnas la gcig tu 'du bar byed do //
analyzed: yang dang yang du 'du ba zhes bya ba ni yul gyi bya bar dpyod par gyur pas yang dang yang du gnas la gcig tu 'du bar byed do //
translated: “Repeatedly coming together” means that, by analyzing the activity of the object, one repeatedly abides in and comes together with the object.

original: mang du 'du ba las kyang gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rtag tu gnas pa'am rtag tu gnas pa las gnas par 'gyur zhing ldang bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mang du 'du ba las kyang gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rtag tu gnas pa'am rtag tu gnas pa las gnas par 'gyur zhing ldang bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: “Abiding through the coming together of many” means that one abides in the object through abiding in it constantly or abiding in it for a long time, and one arises from that abiding.

original: mthun pa zhes bya ba ni 'du ba dang ldan pa blo gcig tu gyur pa ste /
analyzed: mthun pa zhes bya ba ni 'du ba dang ldan pa blo gcig tu gyur pa ste /
translated: “Harmony” means that, through the coming together of many, there is a single cognition.

original: thams cad rang bzhin gcig la brtson par phan tshun rjes su mthun par gyur ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: thams cad rang bzhin gcig la brtson par phan tshun rjes su mthun par gyur ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “All are intent on a single nature” means that they are mutually harmonious.

original: bya ba ni thag @184b nye ba dang gtso bor gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: bya ba ni thag @184b nye ba dang gtso bor gyur pa yin no //
translated: “Activity” is that which is proximate and primary.

original: byed pa ni thag ring ba dang phyis bya ba yin pa nyid kyis gtso bor gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: byed pa ni thag ring ba dang phyis bya ba yin pa nyid kyis gtso bor gyur pa yin no //
translated: “Agent” is that which is distant and secondary.

original: mi rigs pa ni rnam par gzhag pa ma yin ba ste /
analyzed: mi rigs pa ni rnam par gzhag pa ma yin ba ste /
translated: “Inappropriate” means that which is not established.

original: sngon gyi chen po de dag gis dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam par gzhag pa de /🔽'dzin bar mi byed cing rnam par 'jog par mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi chen po de dag gis dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam par gzhag pa de / 'dzin bar mi byed cing rnam par 'jog par mi byed pa'o //
translated: The great ones of the past did not grasp at or posit the nature of things.

original: gang yang sngon gyi chen po dag gis rnam par gzhag pa de gcod par mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: gang yang sngon gyi chen po dag gis rnam par gzhag pa de gcod par mi byed pa ste /
translated: The great ones of the past did not cut off or cause the cutting off of what was posited.

original: kun nas gcod par byed par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: kun nas gcod par byed par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: They did not become the cause of the complete cutting off.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: How?

original: ji ltar de dag rigs brgyud pas 'ongs pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshes bden pa dang gtsang sbra la sogs pa yang dag par blangs nas gnas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar de dag rigs brgyud pas 'ongs pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshes bden pa dang gtsang sbra la sogs pa yang dag par blangs nas gnas par gyur pa'o //
translated: They took up and abided by the truths and the pure conduct that were in accordance with the lineage that had been passed down.

original: yul bri dzi'i bud med ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: yul bri dzi'i bud med ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The women of Vṛji, etc.

original: bud med ni me skor byas pa yin la gzhon nu ma ni mna' ma byas pa yin no //
analyzed: bud med ni me skor byas pa yin la gzhon nu ma ni mna' ma byas pa yin no //
translated: Women are those who have gone around the fire. Young women are those who have been taken as wives.

original: yang na bud med ni bdag po bdag po dang bral bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yang na bud med ni bdag po bdag po dang bral bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Or, women are those who are owned, who are without an owner.

original: pa la sogs pas bsrungs pa dang / gnyen bshes kyis bya ba ma yin pa las bzlog pa'o /
analyzed: pa la sogs pas bsrungs pa dang / gnyen bshes kyis bya ba ma yin pa las bzlog pa'o /
translated: protected by her father, mother, brother, sister, or other relatives, or by the king’s men;

original: bdun gyi rgyud kyi nang du 'dus bar gyur pas na gnyen yin no //
analyzed: bdun gyi rgyud kyi nang du 'dus bar gyur pas na gnyen yin no //
translated: “relatives” are those who are included in the sevenfold kinship group.

original: rigs zhes bya ba ni spyir ba ra dva dza la sogs pa'i rigs su chud par gyur pa'o //🔽chad pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i yul de ni 'dir chad pas gcad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rigs zhes bya ba ni spyir ba ra dva dza la sogs pa'i rigs su chud par gyur pa'o // chad pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i yul de ni 'dir chad pas gcad par bya ba yin no //
translated: “Family” means those who belong to the same clan, such as the Bhṛgus, the Āngirasas, and so on.

original: sgrib pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sgrib pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: “Punishable by law” means that the woman is subject to punishment by the king.

original: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i yul de ni chad pa ma gtogs par tshor gcad par 'os pa'am /🔽srung ma dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i yul de ni chad pa ma gtogs par tshor gcad par 'os pa'am / srung ma dang bcas pa ste /
translated: “Reprehensible” means that the woman is subject to punishment by the king, or that she is protected by her relatives.

original: srung pa dang skyob pa rnam pa du ma dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: srung pa dang skyob pa rnam pa du ma dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
translated: “Protected” means that she is protected by her relatives.🔽“Held by another” means that she is married to another man.

original: gzhan gyis yongs su zin pa zhes bya ba ni mna' ma byas pa med par gzhan gyi dbang gis thob par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis yongs su zin pa zhes bya ba ni mna' ma byas pa med par gzhan gyi dbang gis thob par gyur pa'o //
translated: “Not available” means that she is not available for sexual intercourse.

original: phreng ba'i rgyud ni bor ba zhes bya bar thams cad kyis dang por bu mo de sbyin pa'i rgyu mtshan me tog len pa'i sgo nas bzung ba dag yin te /
analyzed: phreng ba'i rgyud ni bor ba zhes bya bar thams cad kyis dang por bu mo de sbyin pa'i rgyu mtshan me tog len pa'i sgo nas bzung ba dag yin te /
translated: The garland lineage is called the discarded because all the men who took that girl as a wife were discarded by her, by way of taking flowers from them.

original: gang gi phyir gang 'ga' zhig bu mo sbyin par 'dod ba des thog mar mag par 'gyur ba la phreng ba byin nas phyis bu mo sbyin par byed pa de'i phyir bu mo de phreng ba'i rgyud bor bzhes bya'o ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang 'ga' zhig bu mo sbyin par 'dod ba des thog mar mag par 'gyur ba la phreng ba byin nas phyis bu mo sbyin par byed pa de'i phyir bu mo de phreng ba'i rgyud bor bzhes bya'o ;
translated: For, when someone wants to give his daughter in marriage, he first gives her a garland to a man who will become her husband, and later gives her to him. Therefore, that girl is called the discarded garland.

original: / brtun te zhes bya ba ni ci bgrod par bya ba 'am ma yin zhes dpyod pa med pa'o //
analyzed: / brtun te zhes bya ba ni ci bgrod par bya ba 'am ma yin zhes dpyod pa med pa'o //
translated: With effort means without analyzing whether or not she should be approached.

original: mthus zhes bya ba ni zil gyis mnan pa'o //
analyzed: mthus zhes bya ba ni zil gyis mnan pa'o //
translated: By force means by overpowering.

original: spyod pa ni 'dir 'dod pa'i yul gyi las su bya ba ston pa yin no //
analyzed: spyod pa ni 'dir 'dod pa'i yul gyi las su bya ba ston pa yin no //
translated: Here, conduct refers to the performance of sexual intercourse.

original: 'dir rigs mthun pa ni sas kyis rgan pa la rgan po'i sgras brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir rigs mthun pa ni sas kyis rgan pa la rgan po'i sgras brjod pa yin no //
translated: Here, the term elder refers to one who is older in terms of ordination.

original: pha'i pha ni 'dir rje'i @185a * //🔽sgras brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: pha'i pha ni 'dir rje'i @185a * //🔽sgras brjod pa yin la /
translated: The term lord refers to one’s father.

original: rje dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni rje dang na chod 'dra bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rje dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni rje dang na chod 'dra bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The phrase like a lord means like a lord in age.

original: pha dang 'dra zhes bya ba ni pha dang 'dra bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: pha dang 'dra zhes bya ba ni pha dang 'dra bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The phrase like a father means like a father in age.

original: btsun par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la ni sems kyis chen po nyid du 'dzin pa ni btsun par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: btsun par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la ni sems kyis chen po nyid du 'dzin pa ni btsun par byed pa yin no //
translated: The phrase he honors and so on means that he holds him in high esteem with his mind.

original: lung 'bogs par byed pa'i sgo nas tshad mar gyur par 'dzin pa ni bla mar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: lung 'bogs par byed pa'i sgo nas tshad mar gyur par 'dzin pa ni bla mar byed pa yin no //
translated: He holds him in high esteem as an authority by means of the transmission of the scriptures.

original: gnas mthon por 'jog par byed pa ni ri mor byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas mthon por 'jog par byed pa ni ri mor byed pa yin no //
translated: He holds him in high esteem as a revered person by placing him in a high seat.

original: sngon du ldang ba dang phyag la sogs pas bla mar byed pa ni mchod pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon du ldang ba dang phyag la sogs pas bla mar byed pa ni mchod pa yin no //
translated: He holds him in high esteem by rising up, greeting him, and so on with devotion.

original: dad pas zhes bya ba ni dad pa sngon su song ba can gyi gus pas so //
analyzed: dad pas zhes bya ba ni dad pa sngon su song ba can gyi gus pas so //
translated: With devotion means with devotion that precedes the respect.

original: mnyan par bya bar sems pa ni tshig rjod par byed pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: mnyan par bya bar sems pa ni tshig rjod par byed pa'i tshe'o //
translated: He listens means he thinks to listen when the words are being spoken.

original: byed pa ni sgrub pa'i dus so //
analyzed: byed pa ni sgrub pa'i dus so //
translated: He practices means at the time of the practice.

original: yul bri dzi'i mchod rten zhes bya ba dag ni gang dag sngon gyi bri dzi dag gis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ched du byas pa'am /
analyzed: yul bri dzi'i mchod rten zhes bya ba dag ni gang dag sngon gyi bri dzi dag gis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ched du byas pa'am /
translated: The stupas of the Brijis are those which the former Brijis made for the former Perfectly Awakened Ones.

original: sngon gyi bri dzi'i rus pa'i phung bo dag la 'dir mchod rten gyi sgras brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon gyi bri dzi'i rus pa'i phung bo dag la 'dir mchod rten gyi sgras brjod pa yin no //
translated: Or else, the word stupa here refers to the heaps of bones of the former Brijis.

original: de dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo zad pa nyid kyis de dag gis mchod pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / lung 'bogs par byed pa dang 'dra bar gus ba'i sgo nas 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo zad pa nyid kyis de dag gis mchod pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / lung 'bogs par byed pa dang 'dra bar gus ba'i sgo nas 'dzin pa'o //
translated: They are worshipped, revered, and recited by those who are devoted to the chief of the lineage, because of their extinction.

original: dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba ni nyes pa zad par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba ni nyes pa zad par gyur pa'o //
translated: The Arhats are those who have destroyed the defilements.

original: drag pa zhes bya ba ni chen po yin no //
analyzed: drag pa zhes bya ba ni chen po yin no //
translated: The great ones are the great ones.

original: dran pa nye bar 'jog pa zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du yul de la skyes par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar 'jog pa zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du yul de la skyes par gyur pa'o //
translated: The foundations of mindfulness are those which have arisen with regard to that object at all times.

original: dran pa khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhe na /
analyzed: dran pa khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhe na /
translated: What kind of mindfulness is it?🔽It is said:

original: smras pa // sems can kun du bsrungs pa ste //
analyzed: smras pa // sems can kun du bsrungs pa ste //
translated: The protection of all beings.

original: bag med pa las sems yongs su bsrungs par gyur ces bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: bag med pa las sems yongs su bsrungs par gyur ces bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is: I have guarded my mind from heedlessness.

original: 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni gnod par bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni gnod par bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The word change means that it is not taught to be harmful.

original: bgrod par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni zil gyis gnon par gyur pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: bgrod par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni zil gyis gnon par gyur pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The word not to be traversed means that it is not to be overcome.

original: de ni nga ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni nga ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word like me means like me.

original: gso spyod gtso bor gyur ba'i gtsug lag khang gi nang la /
analyzed: gso spyod gtso bor gyur ba'i gtsug lag khang gi nang la /
translated: In the monastery, which is the main place for the practice of medicine,

original: 'dir sked pa'i sgras brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir sked pa'i sgras brjod pa yin no //
translated: here the word waist is used.

original: yang dang yang du 'dus par 'gyur ba'i dge slong dag ces pa ni las brgya rtsa gcig gi nang du 'dus pa dge 'dun gyi bgyi ba byung bar gyur pa na'o //
analyzed: yang dang yang du 'dus par 'gyur ba'i dge slong dag ces pa ni las brgya rtsa gcig gi nang du 'dus pa dge 'dun gyi bgyi ba byung bar gyur pa na'o //
translated: The word monks who gather again and again means those who gather in the hundred and one activities, when the work of the Saṅgha arises.

original: phal cher 'dus pa ni 'du ba sbyin pa la 'dra bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phal cher 'dus pa ni 'du ba sbyin pa la 'dra bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The word mostly gathered means that they are similar in giving the gathering.

original: lam tshogs dang bcas pa ni 'dir dge ba'i chos yin par reg par bya'o //
analyzed: lam tshogs dang bcas pa ni 'dir dge ba'i chos yin par reg par bya'o //
translated: The word path here should be understood as virtuous dharmas.

original: mthun bzhin du zhes bya ba ni blo gcig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mthun bzhin du zhes bya ba ni blo gcig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: The word in harmony means with a single mind.

original: bya ba ni bstan pa la phan 'dogs par byed pa dang / nye bar gnas pa gtso bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni bstan pa la phan 'dogs par byed pa dang / nye bar gnas pa gtso bor gyur pa'o //
translated: Action is that which benefits the teaching and is the principal basis for the teaching.

original: byed pa ni @185b dus phyis 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: byed pa ni @185b dus phyis 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The agent is one who will come later.

original: srid pa'i dbang du 'gro ba ni mi rigs shing tshul ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i dbang du 'gro ba ni mi rigs shing tshul ma yin pa'o //
translated: The phrase “it is not proper and is not the right time” means that it is not proper to go under the power of existence.

original: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i sred pas she na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i sred pas she na /
translated: What kind of craving is it that has such a distinction?

original: skye zhing 'byung ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: skye zhing 'byung ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The text says “craving that is born and arises. ”

original: yang dang yang du skyes pa zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas nas zlos pa'i tshig gnyis yin no //
analyzed: yang dang yang du skyes pa zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas nas zlos pa'i tshig gnyis yin no //
translated: The two repetitions are based on the phrase “is born again and again. ”

original: spyir yang srid pa dang rjes su mthun pa ni sred pa yin zhing /
analyzed: spyir yang srid pa dang rjes su mthun pa ni sred pa yin zhing /
translated: In general, craving is that which is in accord with existence.

original: de ma thag pa'i skye ba don du gnyer ba'i 'dod chags ni dga' ba'i 'dod chags yin la /
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i skye ba don du gnyer ba'i 'dod chags ni dga' ba'i 'dod chags yin la /
translated: The attachment that seeks birth immediately after death is the attachment of delight.

original: de dang lhan cig par gyur pa ni /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig par gyur pa ni /
translated: That which is associated with that is

original: lhan cig 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung ba yin no //
translated: co-existent.

original: de dang de la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba ni thams cad du don du gnyer ba'i ngang tshul can yin no //
analyzed: de dang de la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba ni thams cad du don du gnyer ba'i ngang tshul can yin no //
translated: The phrase “is delighted with this and that” means that it is the nature of all to seek.

original: dbang du 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni de'i dbang du 'gro bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dbang du 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni de'i dbang du 'gro bar gyur pa'o //
translated: “Come under the power of” means come under the power of that.

original: gnas brtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gnas brtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “Elder” and so on.

original: gnas brtan ni 'dir lo bcu lon pa yin la /
analyzed: gnas brtan ni 'dir lo bcu lon pa yin la /
translated: Here, an elder is one who has ten years seniority.

original: rgyal tshab lta bu ni lo nyi shu lon pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyal tshab lta bu ni lo nyi shu lon pa yin no //
translated: One who is like a regent is one who has twenty years seniority.

original: rab tu byung nas ring du lon pa yang lo sum cu la sogs pa lon pa yin no //
analyzed: rab tu byung nas ring du lon pa yang lo sum cu la sogs pa lon pa yin no //
translated: One who has long been a monk is one who has thirty years seniority and so on.

original: goms pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yin la /
analyzed: goms pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yin la /
translated: “Practice” is the noble path.

original: mngon par spyod pa ni tshangs par spyad pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon par spyod pa ni tshangs par spyad pa yin no //
translated: “Live the holy life” is to live the life of purity.

original: ston pa ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa yin no //
analyzed: ston pa ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa yin no //
translated: “Teacher” is the Blessed Buddha, who is praised in terms of his qualities.

original: bsngags pa ni de dag ni yon tan dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pas bsngags pa yin no //
analyzed: bsngags pa ni de dag ni yon tan dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pas bsngags pa yin no //
translated: “Praise” is to praise in such terms as “They have good qualities.”

original: de gang gis bsngags pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang gis bsngags pa yin zhe na /
translated: By whom are they praised?

original: mkhas pas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: mkhas pas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: “By the wise” is said.

original: rnam par shes par byed pas na mkhas pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes par byed pas na mkhas pa ste /
translated: They are wise because they make known.

original: shin tu shes rab dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: shin tu shes rab dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means “endowed with great wisdom.”

original: bslab pa zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi yin no //
analyzed: bslab pa zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi yin no //
translated: “ Training” means the bases of training.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'i chos yin no //🔽rjes su ston pa zhes bya ba ni lam sgom pa'am /
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'i chos yin no // rjes su ston pa zhes bya ba ni lam sgom pa'am /
translated: “ Dharma” means the Dharma that is taught.🔽“ Instruction” means the path of meditation,

original: tshogs kyi lam lung 'bogs pa yin no //
analyzed: tshogs kyi lam lung 'bogs pa yin no //
translated: or the path of accumulation, which is the transmission of the Dharma.

original: bag yod pa ni dge ba'i chos sgom pa'o //
analyzed: bag yod pa ni dge ba'i chos sgom pa'o //
translated: “ Carefulness” means cultivating virtuous dharmas.

original: rab tu yangs pa ni phan 'dogs pa ste /
analyzed: rab tu yangs pa ni phan 'dogs pa ste /
translated: “ Extensive” means helpful.

original: gang gi phyir chos so sor rgyas pa thob par gyur pa de la 'dir so sor rgyas pa'i sgras brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos so sor rgyas pa thob par gyur pa de la 'dir so sor rgyas pa'i sgras brjod pa yin no //
translated: Because it is the attainment of the expansion of the Dharma, here the word “expansion” is used.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig pa'o //
translated: “ Concentration” means one-pointedness of mind.

original: las la dga' bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: las la dga' bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “ One delights in activity” and so on.

original: bsam gtan dang ; 'don pa dang / chos dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun gyi las ma gtogs pa 'di ltar bya ba la sogs pa de dag thams cad las kyi sgras brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang ; 'don pa dang / chos dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun gyi las ma gtogs pa 'di ltar bya ba la sogs pa de dag thams cad las kyi sgras brjod pa yin no //
translated: Except for the activities of the saṅgha that are related to meditative concentration, recitation, and the Dharma, all of these activities such as “this should be done” and so on are referred to by the word “activity.”

original: dga' bar bya ba yin pas na dga' ba yin la /
analyzed: dga' bar bya ba yin pas na dga' ba yin la /
translated: It is delight because it is what is to be delighted in.

original: las la dga' ba ni las la dga' ba yin te /
analyzed: las la dga' ba ni las la dga' ba yin te /
translated: Delight in activity is delight in work.

original: las rnam pa sna tshogs ni 'brel par @186a * //
analyzed: las rnam pa sna tshogs ni 'brel par @186a * //
translated: Various kinds of work are connected with it.

original: gyur ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gyur ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: don de nyid la yi ge'i yul gyis smra ba dang / phyir smra ba dang / phyir smra bas rtsod par byed pa ni 'dir smra ba'i sgras brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: don de nyid la yi ge'i yul gyis smra ba dang / phyir smra ba dang / phyir smra bas rtsod par byed pa ni 'dir smra ba'i sgras brjod pa yin no //
translated: The same point is expressed by the word “disputation” in the verse, since it is a matter of dispute among the various schools of philosophy.

original: gnyid la dga' ba zhes bya ba ni rtag tu gnyid la phyogs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gnyid la dga' ba zhes bya ba ni rtag tu gnyid la phyogs par gyur pa'o //
translated: Delight in sleep is the constant inclination to sleep.

original: rgyal po dang rkun po dang g-yul la sogs pa'i gtam ni bre mo gtam yin no //🔽'dre ba ni rab tu byung ba dang khyim pa dang shin tu 'dres par gyur pa'am /
analyzed: rgyal po dang rkun po dang g-yul la sogs pa'i gtam ni bre mo gtam yin no // 'dre ba ni rab tu byung ba dang khyim pa dang shin tu 'dres par gyur pa'am /
translated: Idle talk is talk about kings, thieves, and politics.🔽Association is the association of the ordained with householders.

original: 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang 'dres par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang 'dres par gyur pa'o //
translated: Or it is the association with the discursive thoughts of desire.

original: rnyed pa ni nor thob pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed pa ni nor thob pa'o //
translated: Gain is the acquisition of wealth.

original: sems kyis chen po nyid du 'dzin pa ni bkur sti yin no //🔽tshigs su bcad pa ni grags pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyis chen po nyid du 'dzin pa ni bkur sti yin no //🔽tshigs su bcad pa ni grags pa'o //
translated: Honor is the esteem in which one is held by others.🔽Fame is the praise of one’s good qualities by others.

original: gzhan gyi 'du shes ni gzhan khong du chud pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'du shes ni gzhan khong du chud pa ste /
translated: The notion of others is the understanding of others.🔽The notion of others is for the sake of gain, honor, and fame.

original: rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa'i ched ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni gzhan gyi 'du shes te spangs pa'i sbyor ba'i rjes su ldan par spyod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa'i ched ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni gzhan gyi 'du shes te spangs pa'i sbyor ba'i rjes su ldan par spyod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: One does not practice in order to associate with the application of abandonment.

original: nyon mongs pa spangs shing dor ba'i sbyor ba ni spangs pa'i sbyor ba yin la /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa spangs shing dor ba'i sbyor ba ni spangs pa'i sbyor ba yin la /
translated: The application of abandonment is the application of abandoning and rejecting the defilements.

original: de dang rjes su 'brel pa de'i phyir 'brel par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de dang rjes su 'brel pa de'i phyir 'brel par gyur pa yin no //
translated: One is associated with it because one is connected with it.

original: cung zad tsam dang ches cung zad tsam gyis bya ba la shin tu chud pa ni cung zad tsam yin la /
analyzed: cung zad tsam dang ches cung zad tsam gyis bya ba la shin tu chud pa ni cung zad tsam yin la /
translated: One is slightly engaged in action and very slightly engaged in action.🔽One is slightly engaged in action because one is not the principal one.

original: gtso bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir yon tan gong ma la ltos pa med pa zhes bya ba ni ches cung zad tsam yin te /
analyzed: gtso bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir yon tan gong ma la ltos pa med pa zhes bya ba ni ches cung zad tsam yin te /
translated: One is very slightly engaged in action because one does not rely on higher qualities.

original: dper na rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i nyon mongs pa zil gyis gnon pa ni gnas kyi rgyu mtshan lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i nyon mongs pa zil gyis gnon pa ni gnas kyi rgyu mtshan lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the defilement that seizes its own characteristic is like the cause of the basis.

original: de nyid khyad par rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid khyad par rtogs pa yin te /
translated: That is the realization of the distinctive,

original: rtogs pa'i khong du chud pa ma yin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i khong du chud pa ma yin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not the realization of the distinctive.

original: bar ni dbus yin no //
analyzed: bar ni dbus yin no //
translated: The middle is the center.

original: yon tan gong ma brnyes par byed pa'i bya ba'i phyir sems bzod pa med pa'i skyo ba dang / yid 'byung ba ni rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: yon tan gong ma brnyes par byed pa'i bya ba'i phyir sems bzod pa med pa'i skyo ba dang / yid 'byung ba ni rnam grangs yin no //
translated: The patience of mind is the weariness and disgust that cause one to obtain the higher virtues.

original: gong ma'i bya ba yod na zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gong ma'i bya ba yod na zhes bya ba la /
translated: If there is the activity of the higher,

original: nyon mongs pa ma lus pa spangs pa ni 'di gong ma'i bya ba yin te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ma lus pa spangs pa ni 'di gong ma'i bya ba yin te /
translated: the activity of the higher is the abandonment of all the defilements.

original: de yod par gyur na'o //
analyzed: de yod par gyur na'o //
translated: If that exists,

original: dad pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dad pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Endowed with faith, etc.

original: dad pa khyad par can dang ldan par gyur pa ni dad pa dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dad pa khyad par can dang ldan par gyur pa ni dad pa dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
translated: Endowed with distinctive faith is endowed with faith.

original: ngo tsha ni gus pa dang ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: ngo tsha ni gus pa dang ldan pa yin la /
translated: Shame is respect.

original: ngo tsha gang la yod pa de dag ni ngo tsha dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: ngo tsha gang la yod pa de dag ni ngo tsha dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Those who have shame are endowed with shame.

original: gus pa dang bcas pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gus pa dang bcas pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is considered that they have respect.

original: kha na ma tho ba dag la 'jigs par lta ba nyid ni khrel yin te de gang la yod pa de dag ni khrel yod pa'o //
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba dag la 'jigs par lta ba nyid ni khrel yin te de gang la yod pa de dag ni khrel yod pa'o //
translated: Shame is the very seeing of the blameworthiness of offenses. Those who have it are ashamed.

original: dge ba'i chos bskyed pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos spang ba'i phyir gang dag brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos bskyed pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos spang ba'i phyir gang dag brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no //
translated: Those who are diligent in generating virtuous dharmas and abandoning non-virtuous dharmas are diligent.

original: gang dge @186b ba'i chos la dran pa nye bar gnas shing drang por gyur pas 'jug pa de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: gang dge @186b ba'i chos la dran pa nye bar gnas shing drang por gyur pas 'jug pa de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
translated: Those who engage in virtue with mindfulness present and upright are established in mindfulness.

original: sems rtse gcig pa thob pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa yin la /
analyzed: sems rtse gcig pa thob pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa yin la /
translated: Those who attain one-pointedness of mind are concentrated.

original: shes rab can ni shin tu shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab can ni shin tu shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
translated: Those who are wise are endowed with wisdom.

original: chos shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: chos shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Regarding knowing dharmas and so on,

original: mdo sde las ji ltar na dge slong chos shes pa yin /
analyzed: mdo sde las ji ltar na dge slong chos shes pa yin /
translated: how is a monk one who knows dharmas?

original: 'di la dge slong chos shes pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di la dge slong chos shes pa yin te /
translated: Here, a monk is one who knows dharmas.

original: dper na mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / ji ltar na don shes pa yin /
analyzed: dper na mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / ji ltar na don shes pa yin /
translated: How is one who knows the meaning?

original: 'di la dge slong don shes pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di la dge slong don shes pa yin te /
translated: Here, a monk knows the meaning,🔽saying, “This is the meaning of this and that.”

original: smras pa 'di dang 'di'i don 'di dang 'di yin no zhes ngag gi don yongs su shes par nus pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: smras pa 'di dang 'di'i don 'di dang 'di yin no zhes ngag gi don yongs su shes par nus pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ba yin no //
translated: He is capable of understanding the meaning of speech, up to this.

original: dus shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ni bdag gi zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan dang / 'di ni rab tu 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / 'di ni btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan gyis dus yin no zhes 'di la dge slong gis shes pa ste /
analyzed: dus shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ni bdag gi zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan dang / 'di ni rab tu 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / 'di ni btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan gyis dus yin no zhes 'di la dge slong gis shes pa ste /
translated: Knowing the time means that a monk knows the time for this, “This is the time for the sign of my serenity, this is the time for the sign of full engagement, this is the time for the sign of equanimity.”

original: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i dus ni dge ba dang brtson 'grus kyi dus dge ba dang / btang snyoms kyi dus dge ba zhes bya ba'i don 'dir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i dus ni dge ba dang brtson 'grus kyi dus dge ba dang / btang snyoms kyi dus dge ba zhes bya ba'i don 'dir 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning here is that the time for cultivating concentration is the time for virtue, the time for effort is the time for virtue, and the time for equanimity is the time for virtue.

original: tshod shes pa zhes bya ba ni bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dag gi tshod rig pa yin no //
analyzed: tshod shes pa zhes bya ba ni bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dag gi tshod rig pa yin no //
translated: Knowing the right amount means knowing the right amount of food, drink, snacks, and condiments.

original: bdag shes pa zhes bya ba ni kho bo'i tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / shes rab dang / lung dang / rtogs pa la sogs pa 'di tsam dang ldan par bdag 'jal ba la mkhas pa yin te /
analyzed: bdag shes pa zhes bya ba ni kho bo'i tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / shes rab dang / lung dang / rtogs pa la sogs pa 'di tsam dang ldan par bdag 'jal ba la mkhas pa yin te /
translated: Knowing oneself means being skilled in evaluating oneself in terms of one’s morality, learning, and wisdom, one’s scriptural knowledge and realization, and so on.

original: bdag shes pas gzhan la smod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag shes pas gzhan la smod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because one knows oneself, one does not disparage others.

original: 'khor shes pa zhes bya ba ni rgyal rigs la sogs pa'i 'khor dang mthun par tha snyad du byed pa la mkhas pa yin no //🔽de skad du yang de la bdag gis 'di ltar gzhug par bya /
analyzed: 'khor shes pa zhes bya ba ni rgyal rigs la sogs pa'i 'khor dang mthun par tha snyad du byed pa la mkhas pa yin no // de skad du yang de la bdag gis 'di ltar gzhug par bya /
translated: Knowing the assembly means being skilled in using conventional expressions in a way that is appropriate for the assembly of nobles and so on.🔽In this regard, it is taught:

original: 'di ltar gnas par bya zhes bya ba la sogs par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gnas par bya zhes bya ba la sogs par bstan pa yin no //
translated: “I should engage in this way; I should abide in this way.”

original: gang zag mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gang zag mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: Knowing the highest and lowest spiritual capacities of people.

original: gnag zag thams cad kyi yul khyad par du 'phags pa dang / khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin pa'i bye brag yongs su shes pa la mkhas par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: gnag zag thams cad kyi yul khyad par du 'phags pa dang / khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin pa'i bye brag yongs su shes pa la mkhas par gyur pa yin no //
translated: He is skilled in knowing the difference between the objects of all the defiled and undefiled, and between the superior and the non-superior.

original: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
